methods.name: AFGTargetPoint
methods.comment: Sets default values for this actor's properties

methods.name: GetLifetimeReplicatedProps
methods.comment: Decide on what properties to replicate.

methods.name: SetOwningVehicle
methods.comment: Set which vehicle this belongs to

methods.name: IncreaseWaitTime
methods.comment:
Increase wait time
@param addedWaitTime - if not specified we add the default wait time

methods.name: SetWaitTime
methods.comment:
Sets the wait time
@param newWaitTime - time to wait ( seconds )

methods.name: IsTargetSpeedStill
methods.comment: Is target speed low enough to count as still

methods.name: BeginPlay
methods.comment: Called when the game starts or when spawned

properties.name: mNext
properties.comment: Reference to the next target point ( used in linked list )

properties.name: mWaitTime
properties.comment: Accumulated wait time for this node

properties.name: mDefaultWaitTime
properties.comment: Default wait time if this target point has no target speed
